Description: Painted wooden model group: four figures preparing food and beer.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sidmant, from tomb 274, of Meryrahashtef
Curator's comments: Published: Petrie & Brunton, Sedment I, BSAE 34, pl. 11
